product_name: Coleman Insect Repellent - 100 Percent DEET - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: Keep pesky mosquitoes from invading your cozy campsite with Coleman DEET insect repellent. Active ingredient DEET provides long-lasting protection-up to 10 hrs. Insect repellent keeps away disease-carrying mosquitoes as well as biting flies, gnats, ticks and fleas. Easy-to-pack 4 oz. pump bottle allows convenient, on-the-go application.
short_description: Keep pesky mosquitoes from invading your cozy campsite with Coleman DEET insect repellent.
